thread.title: Case registered against BB10's Om Swami for molesting a woman
thread.title_full: Case registered against BB10's Om Swami for molesting a woman

title: Case registered against BB10's Om Swami for molesting a woman
text:
Case registered against BB10's Om Swami for molesting a woman A case has been registered against the self-styled godman for apparently molesting a woman. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Anvita Singh A + A - BB10 contestant Om Swami. Picture courtesy: YouTube 
Bigg Boss 10 contestant Om Swami has not stopped making news ever since he first entered the Bigg Boss house. And now, according to a recent reports, a case has been filed against the baba for allegedly molesting a woman. 
According to the woman, Om Swami and his companion attempted to humiliate the lady by tearing her clothes apart at Rajghat area on February 7. They apparently even abused her while doing so, but fled when she started crying for help. 
Om Swami has been charged with Section 354 (Assault on a woman with an intent to outrage her modesty) of the Indian Penal Code. 
The woman will record her statement tomorrow, according to a report in Pinkvilla. 
Also read: Now Om Swami claims the recent earthquake happened because he was mistreated on Bigg Boss 
"The woman alleged that the men then took her to their room in an ashram near ITO, where they attempted to rape her. She said that she begged them to let her go, but they abused her and threatened to ruin her image," a police officer said. 
"Following the woman's complaint, we have registered a case of molestation and voluntarily causing hurt against Swami Om and his associate. Teams have been formed to arrest them. Raids are being conducted and the arrest will soon be made. We are also verifying the allegations made by the woman," DCP, Central, MS Randhawa told Hindustan Times. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
